sprint_goal: Establish foundational infrastructure, CI/CD for backend, and the core user authentication flow (Registration, Login & Routing).
epic_coverage: Infrastructure, CI/CD, Project Setup; User Authentication & Lifecycle
key_deliverables: Provisioned environments; Backend CI/CD pipeline; Web registration for new tenants; Email/password login; Role-based routing.
demo_objectives: Demo a new Admin registering their organization. Demo the Admin logging in and landing on a placeholder Admin dashboard.
success_criteria: All infrastructure is provisioned as code; Backend CI/CD is functional; A new tenant can be created via the web UI.
risk_factors: Complexity of Workload Identity Federation setup (TASK-009); Potential for flaws in core multi-tenancy rules (RISK-001).
mitigation_strategies: Allocate senior DevOps time for CI/CD auth setup. Mandate 100% test coverage for tenancy security rules.
burndown_target: Complete foundational setup tasks by Day 5 to unblock feature work.

sprint_name: Sprint 2: User Invitation & First Mobile Feature
sprint_goal: Implement the complete user invitation lifecycle and deliver the primary 'Check-In' functionality for Subordinates.
epic_coverage: User Authentication & Lifecycle; Core Attendance Workflow
key_deliverables: Admin can invite users via email; Invited users can register; Password reset flow; Subordinate can check-in on mobile app.
demo_objectives: Demo an Admin inviting a new Subordinate. Demo the Subordinate receiving the email, registering, and checking in on the mobile app.
success_criteria: End-to-end user invitation flow is functional; Core check-in action is working on iOS and Android.
risk_factors: Email deliverability (spam filters); Inconsistent behavior of native location services across devices.
mitigation_strategies: Configure SPF/DKIM for SendGrid. Test on a variety of physical devices.
integration_windows: Integration between web invite and backend function by Day 4.

sprint_goal: Enable the full check-in/check-out cycle and introduce robust offline capabilities for attendance marking.
epic_coverage: Core Attendance Workflow; User Authentication & Lifecycle
key_deliverables: Check-out functionality; UI logic preventing check-out before check-in; Offline attendance marking; Automatic data sync upon reconnection.
demo_objectives: Demo a full check-in/check-out cycle. Demo putting the device in airplane mode, checking in, reconnecting, and verifying data sync.
success_criteria: Users can complete a full workday attendance cycle; Offline functionality is reliable and seamless.
risk_factors: Platform-specific restrictions on background sync tasks; Race conditions during online/offline transitions.
mitigation_strategies: Extensive manual testing on physical iOS and Android devices; Code defensively for background task limitations.

sprint_goal: Enable the core Supervisor workflow: view, approve, and reject subordinate attendance. Establish Admin team creation. Implement brute-force lockout.
epic_coverage: Supervisor & Admin Management; User Authentication & Lifecycle
key_deliverables: Admin 'Create Team' UI; Supervisor dashboard with a list of pending approvals; Approve/Reject functionality for single records.
demo_objectives: Demo an Admin creating a team and assigning a Supervisor. Demo a Supervisor logging in, viewing a pending record, and approving it.
success_criteria: Supervisors can successfully action pending attendance records; Data scoping is enforced by security rules.
risk_factors: Flaw in RBAC security rules allowing supervisors to see other teams' data (part of RISK-001).
mitigation_strategies: Write specific emulator tests for supervisor data access scenarios.

sprint_goal: Build out core Admin user and team management capabilities, including deactivation, subordinate reassignment, and preventing circular hierarchies.
epic_coverage: Supervisor & Admin Management; User Authentication & Lifecycle
key_deliverables: Admin can manage team members; Admin can deactivate users; System prevents orphaning of subordinates; Deactivated users cannot log in; Circular reporting structures are blocked.
demo_objectives: Demo an Admin deactivating a user. Demo the system blocking the deactivation of a supervisor and guiding the admin to reassign subordinates. Demo the system blocking the creation of a circular A->B->A reporting line.
success_criteria: All data integrity rules for user management are implemented and tested.
risk_factors: Complexity of the hierarchy traversal algorithm for circular dependency checks; Logic for immediate session invalidation.
mitigation_strategies: Write extensive unit tests for the hierarchy validation function; Use Firebase Admin SDK's `revokeRefreshTokens` for secure session termination.

sprint_goal: Implement the end-to-end attendance correction workflow for Subordinates and Supervisors, including notifications.
key_deliverables: Subordinates can request corrections; Supervisors can review, approve, or reject them; Subordinates are notified of the outcome via push notification.
demo_objectives: Demo a Subordinate requesting a time change. Demo the Supervisor seeing the request and approving it. Demo the Subordinate receiving the approval notification.
success_criteria: The full correction workflow is functional, auditable, and provides timely feedback to users.
risk_factors: Complexity of implementing robust deep-linking for push notifications on both iOS and Android.
mitigation_strategies: Allocate specific testing time for notification handling in all app states (foreground, background, terminated).

sprint_goal: Establish the Audit Log for compliance and complete Admin management features like direct record edits and full team lifecycle management.
epic_coverage: Admin Reporting & Dashboard; Supervisor & Admin Management
key_deliverables: Filterable Audit Log report; Admin ability to directly edit attendance with justification; Admin can edit and delete teams.
demo_objectives: Demo an Admin editing a subordinate's check-out time and providing a justification. Demo viewing the corresponding entry in the new Audit Log report and filtering it.
success_criteria: All critical administrative actions are logged and viewable; Admins have the necessary tools for data correction and organizational management.
risk_factors: Performance of the Audit Log report with complex filters and large datasets (RISK-002).
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize the design and testing of Firestore composite indexes for the audit log collection.

sprint_goal: Deliver the initial suite of Admin reports, including summary, filtering, late/early, and exception reports.
key_deliverables: Summary Attendance Report (Daily/Weekly/Monthly); A reusable filtering component; Late Arrival/Early Departure Report; Exception Report.
demo_objectives: Demo the Admin dashboard reports. Show filtering the summary report by date and team. Show the Late Arrival report identifying a specific user.
success_criteria: Admins have access to a functional reporting dashboard with actionable insights.
risk_factors: Performance of timezone-aware calculations for the Late/Early report at scale.
mitigation_strategies: Consider a server-side data pre-aggregation strategy using a scheduled Cloud Function if client-side performance is poor.
